question: Indian shooters Jitu Rai and Heena Sidhu won this cup recently?
explanation: Indian shooters Jitu Rai and Heena Sidhu won the gold medal in mixed team 10m air pistol event of the International Shooting Sports Federation (ISSF) World Cup held at Gabala, Azerbaijan. There are 430 athletes from 45 countries participated in the whole event. China won six medals, including three gold.
